chunk:
Estee Lauder Nutritious Booster Drops Serum

Brand: Estée Lauder

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: WATER\AQUA\EAU, GLYCERIN, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, GLYCERETH-26, LACTOBACILLUS FERMENT, NIACINAMIDE, HEXYLENE GLYCOL, LAMINARIA SACCHARINA EXTRACT, PORPHYRIDIUM CRUENTUM EXTRACT, CASTANEA SATIVA (CHESTNUT) SEED EXTRACT, GLYCINE SOJA (SOYBEAN) SEED EX

JA (SOYBEAN) SEED EXTRACT, SODIUM HYALURONATE, HYDROLYZED RICE EXTRACT, PUNICA GRANATUM (POMEGRANATE) PERICARP EXTRACT, CAMELLIA SINENSIS (GREEN TEA) LEAF EXTRACT, DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE, CAFFEINE, SUCROSE, XANTHAN GUM, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, GLYCERYL ACRYLATE/ACRYLIC ACID COPOLYMER, POLYSORBATE 20, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, ALCOHOL DENAT.

XIDE, ALCOHOL DENAT., PHENOXYETHANOL, SODIUM BENZOATE

Directions: Usage: AM and PM, apply to clean skin.

How to incorporate into a regimen: Use after your treatment lotion and before your moisturizer. (i.e., Cleanser, Treatment Lotion, BOOSTER, Moisturizer)
